Pre-Game Insights: Andy Balbirnie will return for the ODIs after being left out of the T20I squad.
Paul Stirling will lead the Irish side.
Temba Bavuma will lead South Africa.
Lungi Ngidi, Nandre Burger, Ottneil Baartman, and Lizaad Williams will form a strong bowling attack for South Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series will be held in Abu Dhabi.
The first match will be on October 2, the second on October 4, and the third on October 7.
The series will not be telecast live in India, but live streaming will be available on the Fancode app and its website.
Others: The IRE vs SA ODIs 2024 schedule has been announced.
The series will be streamed on various platforms around the world.
